name: KAMASUTRA \ 爱经
description:
KAMASUTRA \ 爱经

Kamasutra is a puzzle game for studying poses in sex.
The game has 10 puzzles, each of which opens after the passage of the previous one.
The picture is divided into several parts and you need to collect it.

The game is designed so that people would learn more about sex.
The game uses cartoon style, so as not to cause sexual desire, but only to learn something new

Game features
  • 10 new sexy poses
  • Cartoon style
  • Opportunity to learn new
